As Batman faces public execution, Catwoman and Gordon launch a rescue attempt, but it may fall to Azrael to protect Gotham and don the Batsuit. Azrael’s reemergence as Batman signals dark times for Gotham, with the city in a particularly dark place and the Orghams threatening to erase Batman from memory.

item.title: Batman s Worst Day Was Fixed By The Flash s Worst Enemy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Flash time traveling to save his mother in Flashpoint had disastrous consequences for the DC Universe, but it surprisingly saved the Wayne family in one corner of the Multiverse. The Reverse-Flash intercepts the lightning bolt that would have given Barry Allen his Flash powers, resulting in Barry’s death and Eobard taking over America, killing heroes in the process. Eobard, now experiencing hope, decides to travel through time and fix everyone’s lives, saving the Wayne family in the process, resulting in a Gotham City without Batman.

item.title: Batman Turned Robin s Birthday into a Twisted Lesson in Paranoia
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBatman’s mentorship of the Robins, beginning with Dick Grayson took a toll on their psychological well-being, as seen through a dark lesson in paranoia on Dick’s birthday. Batman struggles to differentiate between the roles of father and mentor, often overstepping boundaries, and as a result, for all of the positive things he has done for his wards, he has left them with trauma as well. Dick Grayson has had to unlearn Batman’s dark approach to training and has repurposed those teachings in a healthier way, becoming one of DC’s greatest heroes.

item.title: Batman vs Deathstroke Cosplay Brings DC s Most Hardcore Rivalry to Real Life
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA stunning Batman and Deathstroke cosplay captures their intense rivalry and pays homage to their epic battles in the comics. The collaboration between cosplayers, digital artist, and suit creators elevates this cosplay to a new level of artistry and quality. The cosplay draws inspiration from the Deathstroke: Batman vs. Deathstroke hardcover, showcasing a deep appreciation for the comics. Literature ReviewFrom comic panels to concrete reality, a Batman vs Deathstroke cosplay brilliantly blurs the lines, bringing DC’s most hardcore rivalry to life.

item.title: Batman vs Supergirl Reveals the Anti-Kryptonian Contingency Attack He Can Use Anywhere, With No Gadgets
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBatman defeats Supergirl using Klurkor, a specialized martial art taught on Krypton, showcasing his resourcefulness and ability to strategize against powerful opponents. Klurkor gives Batman a major advantage against Kryptonians, as he can utilize it to take on foes without relying on his usual gadgets or Kryptonite. Klurkor is a highly underrated fighting style in the DC Universe, and both Batman and Supergirl demonstrate its effectiveness in their battles, highlighting its relevance for DC’s leading fighters.

item.title: Batman, Superman, and Wonder Woman Reveal the True Reasons They ll Never Stop Being Heroes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBatman’s motivation for continuing his heroism stems from his commitment to prevent any other children from enduring a fate similar to his own. Wonder Woman is driven by a desire to see the good in the world and bring about its flourishing. Superman finds joy in helping others and believes that nothing feels better than giving. Literature ReviewBatman, Superman, and Wonder Woman share the reasons why they will never stop being heroes, offering a rare glimpse into their individual psyches.

item.title: Batmans New Pet Is Even More Badass Than Robins Bat Dragon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBatman’s new pet in Batman: Off-World #3 is a colossal armored war hound, capable of supporting the Dark Knight and posing a threat to adversaries. The addition of this enigmatic creature to the limited series should create anticipation among fans for its action-packed introduction and the dynamic it will bring. Artist Doug Mahnke’s cover art featuring Batman and the war hound showcases his unparalleled artistic skill and captivates fans, solidifying Batman: Off-World as a visually compelling addition to DC’s Batman comics.

item.title: Batmans Ultimate Contingency Proves Hell Never Kill the Joker
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBatman’s backup personality, Zur-En-Arrh, defeats and imprisons him and the Joker instead of killing them. Zur-En-Arrh is a more violent and ruthless version of Batman, but even he cannot bring himself to kill the Joker. This reaffirms Batman’s commitment to never killing his greatest enemy, even when pushed to his limits. Literature ReviewDespite every awful thing the Joker‚Äôs ever done, Batman is never going to kill him and the Dark Knight‚Äôs ultimate contingency proves it.

item.title: Batwoman Admits She No Longer Sees Batman as a Hero - & Won t Work with Him
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBatwoman is quitting her association with Batman due to his recent actions and the harm he has caused to the city and their mission to protect it. She is joining a new team called the Outsiders, led by Luke Fox, dedicated to the discovery and cataloging of unknown history and knowledge. Batwoman’s decision to leave the Bat-Family is motivated by her desire to do good in the world without enabling Batman’s destructive behaviors.

item.title: Bazaldua, Casagrande, Klein 10 of This Years Best Covers From Marvel s Stormbreakers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel’s Stormbreakers program has produced some of the most beautiful and creative variant covers in the comic book industry. Artists like Elena Casagrande, Jan Bazaldua Mart√≠n C√≥ccolo, C.F. Villa, and Federico Vincenti have created exceptional artwork for the Stormbreakers Class of 2023. The covers feature iconic Marvel heroes like Luke Cage, Captain America, Scarlet Witch, Ghost Rider, Spider-Man, Baby Groot, She-Hulk, Black Panther, and Daredevil in various themes like war, zombies, and Marvel’s most adorable pets.

item.title: Beast Boy Reveals He Can Cheat His Powers to Become DC s Smartest Man Alive
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBeast Boy’s brain power can outperform even the smartest people in the DC Universe, thanks to his ability to transform into animals with larger glia-to-brain ratios. Transforming into animals gives Beast Boy the brain capacity to formulate plans at faster rates, making him an essential asset to the Titans in superhero situations. Beast Boy’s ability to enhance his cognitive ability through his powers is a valuable benefit that allows him to make up for his own tactical limitations.

item.title: Beast Boy s Most Painful Transformation Ever Turns His Powers into Pure Nightmare Fuel
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBeast Boy’s latest transformation into a giant alien starfish called Garro is physically and mentally painful. The Titans, led by Nightwing, have taken on the responsibility of safeguarding the world from threats like the powerful alien Necrostar. While Beast Boy is used to unconventional transformations, his Garro form reveals the true horror and distress that can come with his shape-shifting powers. Literature ReviewBeast Boy‚Äôs powers become a frightening torture when Garfield Logan pushes his body well past its limit to create his most powerful form ever.

item.title: Beast Boy s New Powers Just Took Out Superman Like Never Before
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBeast Boy’s spores are turning people into animal/human hybrids, and even Superman isn’t safe from their influence. Superman is constantly on the move to avoid attracting Beast Boy’s spores, while Lois directs him to people in need. Superman can’t fight Beast Boy directly or turn himself into a target, but he is still protecting others from being infected by the spores. Literature ReviewThe now-villainous Beast Boy is ravaging the DC Universe and thanks to his power-seeking spores, the one person who can‚Äôt save the day is Superman.

item.title: Beast Girl, The Boom, Trinity DC s Best New Heroes Will Change The Past, Present, & Future in 2024
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeadeye: Powerful psychic abilities, relative of Amanda Waller, may join new network of heroes. Nitida: Bonded to scarab like Blue Beetle, proficient in using scarab’s powers, stands by Blue Beetle in battles. Circuit Breaker: Uses Still Force for good, recently joined Flash Family, non-traditional powers but valued among Scarlet Speedsters. Literature ReviewFrom forgotten sidekicks to future warriors, DC history got some major updates with the debut of 10 new heroes that promise shape 2024 for the better.

item.title: Beast World One Wonder Woman Villain is Stepping Up to Become a Hero During DC s Latest Crisis
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWonder Woman’s nemesis, Giganta, is stepping up to help save a small town overrun by Beast Boy’s spores, despite the danger. However, Giganta’s decision to fight could backfire as the spores are seeking out powerful hosts, making her a prime target. With the world already stretched thin combating the spores, even Wonder Woman may not be able to stop Giganta from becoming a major threat. Literature Review‚ÄúBeast World‚Äù is causing everyone in the DC Universe to fight back against the monstrous Beast Boy, including one of Wonder Woman‚Äôs greatest enemies.

item.title: BEAST WORLD TOUR - ATLANTIS Proves That Jaws with Superheroes Is a Surprisingly Great Idea (Review)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTitans: Beast World Tour: Atlantis #1 brings humor and heart to the chaotic event of animal-human hybrids attacking the world. The story pays tribute to the movie Jaws, with DC icons heading into the ocean to stop a transformed Black Manta. While the event has been heavy on drama, the Jaws tribute in this issue provides a much-needed bit of levity. Literature ReviewDC‚Äôs latest event continues with Titans: Beast World Tour: Atlantis, an anthology that gives fans some much needed laughs with an unexpected parody.

item.title: Beating Superman Just Proved a D-Lister Is Justice League s Most Powerful Hero
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFirestorm’s control over molecules allows him to create Kryptonite gas, making him capable of taking down Superman. Firestorm’s fusion with the Firestorm Matrix grants him control over energy and matter, giving him an absurd level of power. Firestorm is a prime example of the many characters in the DC Universe who can give Superman a tough fight and should be considered a potential Justice League leader. Literature ReviewSuperman is one of the most powerful Justice League heroes, but one surprising member can take him down with ease, proving even Clark can be beat.

item.title: Black Adam Calls Out the Justice League Hero He ll Never Respect
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Adam delivers a scorching burn to Green Arrow, showing his lack of respect for him. The interaction between Black Adam and Green Arrow highlights their conflicting personalities and sets the stage for intriguing dynamics. Beyond the humor, this scene underscores that, even in Black Adam’s transformation into a hero, he retains a cold-blooded edge. Literature ReviewBlack Adam just unleashed the most scorching (and humorous) insult on one Justice League member, who is sure to be left with a bruised ego.

item.title: Black Adam Cosplay Brings Back the Major Detail Cut for the Rock
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA new cosplay of Black Adam by Knightmage100 brings back a classic detail from the character’s design that was cut from the recent movie. Knightmage100 showcases Black Adam’s various looks throughout his history and captures the essence of the character in each photo. The pointed ears, a puzzling aspect of Black Adam’s appearance, are brought back by Knightmage100, giving the cosplay a sense of danger and menace. Literature ReviewA key part of Black Adam’s original look was cut for his feature film starring the Rock, but now cosplayer Knightmage100 has brought it back.

item.title: Black Adam Just Officially Became DC s Deadliest Man Alive - & Superman Can t Stop Him
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Adam’s latest upgrade makes him unstoppable, even against Superman. Beast Boy’s spores are turning heroes and villains into animal hybrids. The Titans face a difficult challenge in stopping Black Adam without infecting themselves or relying on Superman. Literature ReviewBlack Adam has gotten his most terrifying and destructive upgrade ever and unfortunately for the DC Universe, Superman is powerless to stop him. Warning! Spoilers ahead for Titans: Beast World #2!

item.title: Black Adam s Gut-Wrenching Origin Story Returns to Official DC Canon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSuperman seeks advice from Black Adam, the only one who understands his trauma of being lost in space for years. Black Adam was exiled in space, only returning to Earth after thousands of years. Black Adam offers little comfort to Superman, showing that even after years of reflection, he has no answers to their shared trauma. Literature ReviewThere are plenty of dark origin stories in comic books, but few characters have a backstory as outrageously traumatic as Black Adam.

item.title: Black Cat Cosplay Reinvents Her as a Terrifying Venom Host
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Cat and Venom, former Spider-Man villains, have evolved into morally ambiguous anti-heroes over the years. The stunning cosplay shoot by Gracie the Cosplay Lass combines the look of Black Cat and the Venom symbiote. This terrifying mashup could spell trouble for Spider-Man, as Black Cat and Venom appear to be working together. Literature ReviewIf Black Cat ever got the Venom symbiote, it could be a nightmare for Spider-Man, and now a new cosplay brings this to life.

item.title: Black Cat Cosplay Unleashes Her Best Redesign Ever NIGHT-SPIDER
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBrittany Noel’s Night-Spider cosplay captivates Black Cat enthusiasts with its immaculate craftsmanship and authentic portrayal. Fans overwhelmingly appreciate Noel’s attention to detail, as her stunning embodiment of the character bridges the gap between comic imagery and reality. Noel’s portrayal of Night-Spider is not just cosplay; it serves as a heartfelt tribute to the beloved character, highlighting her depth of knowledge and genuine appreciation for Felicia Hardy. Literature ReviewA fan showcases the pinnacle of Black Cat’s evolution, presenting a stunning Night-Spider cosplay that captures the essence of anti-hero reinvention.

item.title: Black Clover Isn t Just Underappreciated, It s One of the Generation s Best Shonen
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Clover challenges the typical “feel good” message of shonen by exploring a darker worldview where class systems determine success. The symbolic magical system in Black Clover adds depth to the story and reinforces its dreary perspective on power and hierarchy. The series effectively uses foreshadowing and subverted mysteries to create compelling storylines and develop its characters, like Asta. Literature ReviewBlack Clover flies under the radar in the anime and manga community, but it’s actually one of the most important of today’s shonen.

item.title: Black Clover Made a Big Mistake Before Asta & His Former Love Interest s Big fight
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAsta’s opponent’s magic changed after being attacked, suggesting that Sister Lily’s abilities as a Paladin won’t be her true power. Fans want to see Sister Lily fight using her authentic magic, not something given to her as a Paladin. Asta stopped the flow of magic in his opponent, indicating that Sister Lily’s magic is augmented by her Paladin powers. Literature ReviewChapter 348 of Black Clover made a disappointing implication about the type of magic that Sister Lily will wield when she fights Asta.

item.title: Black Clover s Big Return Finally Shows the Black Bulls Huge Powerup
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe first chapter of Black Clover in Jump GIGA introduces the Anti-Magic powers of Magna and Luck given to them by Asta. The chapter showcases Magna and Luck using their enhanced powers to defeat one of Lucius’ clones. The chapter highlights the significance of Asta’s Anti-Magic in making the Black Bulls relevant again and underscores the positive effect Asta has had on the entire squad. Literature ReviewJump GIGA resumes Black Clover’s story that initially began in Shonen Jump with a massive battle that showcases the best version of the Black Bulls.

item.title: Black Clover s Return is on the Edge of Confirming or Debunking a Dark Fan Theory
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Clover chapter #369 reveals that Luck and Magna have already used up half of Asta’s Anti-Magic. Fans are now left wondering if they will lose their magical powers once the Anti-Magic wears off. Contrary to initial expectations, Asta’s transfer of Anti-Magic to the Black Bulls doesn’t automatically destroy their own magic. This is because Asta used the reverse Demon-Dweller Sword ability, which absorbs and wields other forms of magic without destroying them.

item.title: Black Manta Cosplay Proves He s DC s Most Criminally Underrated Villain
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Manta is an iconic villain in the DC Comics world who has caused countless losses and tragedies for Aquaman. A new cosplay of Black Manta, shared on Instagram, rivals the Hollywood version from the upcoming Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom film. This cosplay collaboration between @nycosplayer and @cosplayben brings attention to an underrated character and inspires more creativity in the cosplay community. Literature ReviewAquaman doesn’t have many iconic villains to call his own, with a new cosplay bringing to life the character known as Black Manta in stunning detail!

item.title: Black Suit Spider-Man Cosplay Shows What Peter s Darkest Design Could Look Like in the MCU
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY@wens.1998’s cosplay accurately depicts Spider-Man’s iconic black symbiote suit, showing what Tom Holland’s MCU version could look like. @wens.1998 specializes in creating professional-looking costumes and digital images, consistently reenacting Spider-Man’s comic book stories. The black suit storyline, featured in the 1984 Marvel comic event, Secret Wars, and the 1987 Kraven-centric storyline, Kraven’s Last Hunt, is considered one of the most harrowing events in Spider-Man’s career. @wens.1998’s cosplay captures this dark and unsettling moment.

item.title: Blade Finally Embraces His Vampire Side to Unlock His Full Powers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlade realizes he must embrace his vampire side to defeat the embodiment of evil in the Adana. Dracula teaches Blade that he judges evil without acknowledging the evil within himself. Blade comes to understand that he must embrace the monster within him to defeat the Adana. Literature ReviewAfter training with Dracula in order to take down a villain known as the Adana, Blade realizes he must embrace the monster within himself.

item.title: Blade is Doing The Unthinkable To Battle Marvel s Demonic New Villain
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAt the conclusion of Blade #5, the vampire hunter humbles himself and asks Dracula for help in defeating major new threat the Adana. The unholy alliance between Blade and Dracula may be the only force capable of defeating the Adana and saving the Marvel Universe. The potential of Blade and Dracula working together could make Blade more powerful than ever before, as he seeks to embrace his vampire side to unlock even greater abilities than he has previously.

item.title: Bleach s Quincy Have a Surprising Real World Origin Most Fans Don t Realize
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYQuincy were created as rivals to Soul Reapers, meant to be their opposites in every way - white clothing vs black, long-range weapons vs close-range, etc. Uryu Ishida initially believed himself to be the last Quincy, but the revelation that he wasn’t shook the story, flipping what was known about Quincy. The Quincy arc in Thousand-Year Blood War was almost inevitable given their role as equals and opposites to Soul Reapers, leading to a clash between the two groups.

item.title: Bleach s Real Reason For Ending So Badly Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe ending of Bleach was rushed due to Tite Kubo’s poor mental and physical health, not because of poor sales or pressure from the publisher. Kubo suffered from a partially torn tendon in his left shoulder and requested the manga to end within one or two years due to his deteriorating health. The Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War anime, with Kubo’s involvement, offers a chance to fix the disappointing ending and provide fans with the conclusion they deserve.

item.title: Boruto Finally Teases Mysteries of Time Skip in New Chapter
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #5 will go back in time to explain what happened during Boruto’s three-year absence. The chapter will reveal how Sasuke was incapacitated and Boruto’s reaction to the incident. The focus of the chapter might also be on Boruto’s intense training and his shift in fighting style. Literature ReviewThe official website for Naruto teased that the upcoming chapter of Boruto will dive into the time skip and potentially reveal its mysteries.

item.title: Boruto Officially Surpasses Both One Piece And Jujutsu Kaisen
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto: Two Blue Vortex surpasses best-sellers like One Piece and Jujutsu Kaisen on MANGA Plus, finally pushing the series in the right direction. The new storyline showcases a more interesting and determined Boruto, while supporting characters like Sarada are given bigger roles, revitalizing the stagnant story. While MANGA Plus views alone may not be enough, and the other series are currently on hiatus the positive reaction from fans proves that Two Blue Vortex is the makeover Boruto needed.

item.title: Boruto s Jougan Dojutsu Explained Why It Will Be Key In Part 2 Of The Manga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto’s dojutsu, Jougan, is a key mystery of the story and its connection to the Otsutsuki Clan is still unknown. Jougan is a unique eye technique that grants Boruto the ability to see chakra and access other dimensions through Space-Time Ninjutsu. The title of Boruto Part 2, “Two Blue Vortex,” hints at the potential debut of Jougan in the manga and suggests that mastering it will play a crucial role in Boruto’s journey.

item.title: Boruto s Most Disrepected Villain Still Has A Role To Play In Two Blue Vortex
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCode proves himself to still be a serious threat in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex by defeating Sasuke and displaying his true power. Despite being ridiculed, Code has the potential to become an Otsutsuki god and poses a significant disruptive force. Code’s abilities have been underestimated, and he is likely to continue playing a major role in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex. Literature ReviewWhile it’s commonly believed that Code is nothing more than a ‚Äúfiller villain‚Äù, Boruto: Two Blue Vortex shows he is still a threat to deal with.

item.title: Boruto s New Villains Set Up The Return Of Naruto s Most Controversial One
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe emergence of new powerful villains in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex poses a greater threat than the Ten-Tails Beast, as they possess the ability to absorb chakra and control their hunger. The possibility of Kaguya Otsutsuki’s return is hinted at by the new villains, who possess Rinnegan-shaped eyes and potentially have access to the Six Paths Technique. The Six Paths Technique and other powers granted from the Rinnegan could be used to bring back Kaguya, which opens up another interesting possibility for the future of the series.

item.title: Boruto s Sister s Big Role In The Sequel Was Already Teased In The Anime
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHimawari’s immunity to Kawaki’s alternate reality may be due to her strong ties to her true brother Boruto and her still-unexplained secret power, as explored in the anime. However, the reason could also be that Himawari’s relationship with Kawaki is deeper and more complex than expected, as they bond over shared experiences and develop a strong emotional attachment, but this is only shown in the anime. The Boruto anime provides important details and nuance to the characters and their relationships, filling in gaps that the manga cannot always explore.

item.title: Boruto s Time Skip Misses its Big Chance to Redeem One Classic Series Shinobi
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Boruto time skip missed the opportunity to give Hinata, an underrated female character from Naruto, a bigger role in the story. Hinata is more than just Naruto’s wife and Boruto’s mother, she is the heir to a powerful shinobi clan and became a strong kunoichi through her own efforts. Hinata’s absence from the main storyline is a shame considering her background and connections, and her presence during the time skip could have added depth to the story and allowed her character to reach her full potential.

item.title: Boruto s Timeskip Scar Has An Awesome Explanation That Proves His True Love
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto’s scar, obtained while saving Sarada’s life, sets the stage for the much-awaited battle between him and Kawaki, becoming the main focus of the manga. Boruto and Sarada’s actions in this chapter reinforce their bond and create the perfect background for their relationship to develop further. Boruto’s scar not only signifies his character development but also hints at the lengths he’s willing to go to protect Sarada, his possible love interest.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Hints At How Naruto Will Die
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNaruto’s life is still in grave danger despite being sealed away, as the leader of the Grimes targets him for consumption. Jura, the leader of the new villain group, wishes to kill Naruto and take his chakra, potentially bringing back the series’ biggest villain. Boruto and Kawaki will have to work together to protect their father, setting the series on a path of an exciting battle against the strongest villain yet.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Is Teasing A Conflict Fans Did Not Expect
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto’s return to Konoha may spark a dangerous love triangle between him and his only allies, Sarada and Sumire. Sumire’s romantic feelings for Boruto could complicate the relationship between her and Sarada. The love triangle between Boruto, Sarada, and Sumire could have dangerous consequences for Konoha’s future. Literature ReviewWhile no one is more happy to see Boruto return to Konoha than Sarada and Sumire, the two women may both have feelings for the returning hero.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Reveals How Sasuke s Daughter Will Finally Surpass Him
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSarada’s time to surpass her father has finally come, as she goes up against a clone of Sasuke who is even stronger than him. The new villains in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex possess the looks and power of their originals, with access to their full arsenal of techniques and the chakra of the Ten-Tails. Despite the daunting task, Sarada has the potential to become the strongest Uchiha and achieve her dream of becoming Hokage, using her logic, wit, and improved fighting capabilities.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Reveals Konoha Is Not a Paradise, It s Actually Hell
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKonoha, once a sanctuary of democracy and freedom, is now plagued by distrust and surveillance, as revealed in a conversation between Shikamaru, Kawaki, and Sarada. The sensory unit in Konoha has the ability to pinpoint the whereabouts of everyone in the village and has no expectation of privacy, implying a totalitarian system. Konoha’s current state of distrust reflects its history of violence and repression, which threatens the peace and prosperity of the village.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex s New Villains Are The Franchise s Most Powerful Ever
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto: Two Blue Vortex has introduced new villains that are on a whole other level than previous ones. The self-aware Divine Trees, born from the Ten-Tails, could be the most powerful villains in the series so far. These villains have the Rinnegan and access to the infinite chakra of the Ten-Tails. Even the overpowered Boruto fled as soon as they appeared. Literature ReviewBoruto introduced new villains that rival the likes of Akatsuki and Kara, and are bound to be the strongest to ever appear in the series.

item.title: Breakout Shonen Jump Manga Hints at a Grand Return
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRuriDragon, a popular manga series, went on indefinite hiatus after just six chapters due to the author’s poor health. The author recently stated that their health is fine now and hinted at a possible return of RuriDragon in 2024. RuriDragon was praised for its cute art style, interesting premise, and its unique blend of urban fantasy and slice-of-life storytelling. Literature ReviewRuriDragon was a promising new Shonen Jump manga that’s been on hiatus for over a year, but a recent update from the author teases an imminent return.

item.title: Bruce Campbell s Spider-Man Cameos Go Even Deeper Than You Think
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBruce Campbell’s iconic cameo as the Snooty Usher in Spider-Man 2 is recreated in The Amazing Spider-Man #517 with a humorous twist. Marvel Comics continues the Sam Raimi tradition by featuring Bruce Campbell in the Spider-Man comics. Bruce Campbell has made appearances in various Marvel Comics, including playing Mysterio in the Ultimate Universe and featuring in Marvel Zombies vs. Army of Darkness. Literature ReviewBruce Campbell notoriously cameos in each movie of Sam Raimi’s Spider-Man trilogy.

item.title: Buffy s New Slayer Introduces a Heartbreaking Parallel to Season 6
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBuffy serves as a mentor to Thessaly, Willow and Tara’s daughter, continuing the cycle of caretaking that started in Season 6. The Last Vampire Slayer miniseries ties back to a favor that Willow and Tara did for Buffy in Season 6. Buffy repays her friends’ earlier efforts by training and caring for Thessaly, bringing deeper meaning to their past actions. Literature ReviewBuffy serves as Watcher for a new Slayer in a story that touches on elements introduced in the sixth season of Buffy the Vampire Slayer.

item.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer Spike s New Stepdad Duties Brings His Redemption Arc Full Circle
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSpike’s redemption arc, as it began on the Buffy TV series, now feels complete, as he transitions from villain to stepfather in the Last Vampire Slayer comic series, solidifying his status as a fully redeemed hero. Spike’s journey from slayer-killer to slayer-stepdad is contextualized by a small moment where the slayer he’s training, Willow and Tara’s daughter Thessaly, refers to him as her stepdad. Spike’s arc comes full circle as he settles into domestic life, retiring from fighting and focusing on preserving Slayerhood, an institution he used to revile.

item.title: Captain America Confirms Why He s the Doctor Manhattan of the Marvel Universe
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America and Watchmen’s Doctor Manhattan share a similar perception of time, experiencing past, present, and future simultaneously. Steve Rogers describes his temporal perspective in a way that mirrors Doctor Manhattan’s in Watchmen, giving insight into Cap as an individual. Both Captain America and Doctor Manhattan’s disconnection from normal time perception helps explain their struggles to connect with others ‚Äì but Cap resists succumbing to the inaction exhibited by Manhattan.

item.title: Captain America Explains Why His Shield Works Better for Him Than Anyone Else
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America’s shield is both a defensive and offensive weapon due to its composition and the way it is used by Steve Rogers. The shield is most effective when Steve Rogers is using it, as he has mastered its capabilities through years of experience. Steve Rogers’ extensive knowledge and expertise with the shield make him the key to its success in combat. Literature ReviewCaptain America’s iconic shield is great at defense and offense, but only because its wielder knows how to use it to its full potential.

item.title: Captain America Finally Discovered a Force His Shield Can t Protect Him From
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America’s shield, while strong, has a weakness against supernatural forces like demon fire. The shield, made of vibranium, can absorb energy waves, but is not as effective against magic and demon attacks. Captain America must adapt his tactics to overcome this weakness and defeat Asmoday. Literature ReviewCaptain America’s shield can protect him from the attacks of most of his enemies, but his latest foe is surpassing his strongest defense.

item.title: Captain America Hates One Major DC Team
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDC Universe treats its heroes better than Marvel. Superman and Flash have their own museums and Batman has a burger franchise based on his adventures. Marvel Universe has more hostility towards its heroes. Anti-mutant sentiment and events like Civil War create a more challenging environment for heroes. Captain America sees the Justice League as tyrants who have conquered their world, based on the love that civilians have for them. However, DC citizens genuinely love the Justice League.

item.title: Captain America Just Proved His Forgotten Superpower Is What Makes Him So Unbeatable
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America’s heighted senses make him a formidable fighter and allow him to anticipate his opponents’ moves. Steve Rogers’ auditory perception and situational awareness are beyond what anyone expected, contributing to his success in battles. Captain America’s near-superhuman reflexes would be useless without his incredible senses, making him a well-rounded Super Soldier. Literature ReviewSteve Rogers is well-known for his near-superhuman physique, but a daring confrontation proves there’s more to Captain America than raw muscle.

item.title: Captain America Names the Move That Makes Him Marvel s Best Fighter
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America uses the “Ham Sandwich method” to determine new villain the Emissary is inexperienced and new at what he’s doing. The “Ham Sandwich” technique allows Captain America to stay one step ahead of his enemies, despite facing significant unknowns. Captain America’s ability to assess and categorize his opponents gives him an immediate edge in hand-to-hand combat and solidifies him as one of Marvel’s best fighters. Literature ReviewCaptain America is a seasoned leader and an impressive hand-to-hand combatant, but now he’s revealed his personal trick for sizing up any enemy.

item.title: Captain America Officially Names the 1 MCU Villain He Truly Respects
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America respects Taskmaster, a supervillain with expert fighting abilities, calling the character “A-list” in Spider-Boy #2, reversing the character’s recent underuse in the Marvel Universe. Taskmaster’s MCU depiction in Black Widow received criticism, as it differed greatly from his portrayal in the comics. Captain America advises Spider-Boy to stay on the sidelines during a fight with Taskmaster, recognizing the villain as an A-list opponent and a formidable “one-man army.

item.title: Captain America Reveals His Underrated Super-Senses Give Him a Major Advantage Over Tech
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America’s latest display of power in Spider-Boy #2 is his super sense of smell, which allows him to detect the ionic discharge emitted by the villain Taskmaster’s disguise. Spider-Boy’s version of Spider-Sense helps him to sense imminent danger, leading him to Captain America and their eventual team-up. Captain America’s super-sense of smell rivals Wolverine’s ability to detect secret identities, showcasing another unique and exceptional skill of Steve Rogers.

item.title: Captain America Reveals His Very First Weapon - Long Before the Shield
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSteve Rogers, before becoming Captain America, used a baseball bat as a weapon to combat Nazis, showing his resourcefulness and determination. Steve’s willingness to use whatever is on hand and his determination to fight for what’s right make him a hero, even before the super soldier serum. Captain America’s iconic shield is effective because its wielder knows how to use it to its full potential, showcasing Steve’s skill and understanding of his weapons.

item.title: Captain America s Brother Returns to Marvel Continuity - As the 1 Villain Who Can Outfight Him
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America faces his newly reborn brother, Grant Rogers, who is now a villain and responsible for humiliating Cap in battle. Grant Rogers is the former Hydra Supreme and has now taken on the new identity of Captain Krakoa, using false flag attacks to turn the world against the X-Men. Uncanny Avengers #5 is coming December 20 from Marvel Comics. Literature ReviewSteve Rogers finally has a brother again, as¬†Captain America¬†faces a reborn Grant Rogers in a battle for the title of Marvel’s greatest fighter.

item.title: Captain America s Evil Brother Debuts New Codename as a Permanent Marvel Villain
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America’s Unity Squad defeats Evil Hydra Cap, but Grant Rogers emerges as Marvel’s new Flag-Smasher, reinforcing the twisted state of Marvel’s America. Despite stopping Hydra Cap’s terrorist plot, the corrupt American justice system allows Grant to go free, highlighting its failure. Grant’s new villainous persona as Flag-Smasher makes him even more dangerous, as he can spread his anti-mutant propaganda and serve as a figurehead for Orchis. The battle may be won, but the war against Orchis continues.

item.title: Captain America s Most Important Mentor Was a Shocking Real-Life Figure
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America learns from a surprising mentor, real-life gangster Meyer Lansky, during the Nazi regime. Lansky admires Steve’s courage in standing up to Nazis and urges him to take action. Despite his criminal past, Lansky’s shared disdain for Nazis allows him to offer valuable guidance to Captain America. Literature ReviewCaptain America is known for embodying the ideals of what the United States is supposed to stand for, but his first mentor wasn’t so noble.

item.title: Captain America s Shield Has 1 Explosive Power Only the X-Men Can Use
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGambit discovers that when he charges Captain America’s shield with his kinetic energy powers, it causes an unbelievable explosion due to the shield’s unique composition. Gambit’s powers are capable of far more than just charging playing cards - he has shown the ability to destroy zombie Galactus and can achieve immense explosive force in a matter of seconds. Captain America’s shield is one-of-a-kind and Gambit’s powers works better on it than any other object, making it a rare reusable weapon for Gambit.

item.title: Captain America s Shield Is Getting a Mind-Blowing Upgrade from Doctor Strange
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain America’s shield is merging with Doctor Strange’s Eye of Agamotto. Steve Rogers is fighting the Emissary - a serial killer enhanced with the Super-Soldier serum and Hulk’s gamma radiation. Cap will need his new shield to stand a chance. But Cap’s real enemy is the ancient demon Asmoday, who is directing the Emissary to kill a series of ‘Change Agents’ who would otherwise prevent an upcoming war. Literature ReviewCaptain America is fighting one of his most powerful enemies ever - using an assist from Doctor Strange that imbues his shield with mystic powers.

item.title: Captain Marvel Gets the Best Sidekick She Could Ask For (Even if She Makes Her Weaker)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain Marvel has found the perfect sidekick in Yuna Yang, despite Yuna weakening her powers. Yuna’s bond with Captain Marvel forces her to think more strategically in combat. The psychic link between Captain Marvel and Yuna allows them to work together effectively despite their limitations. Literature ReviewEver since they started teaming up together, Yuna Yang has simultaneously made Captain Marvel stronger (internally) and weaker (externally). Warning: Spoilers for Captain Marvel #2!

item.title: Captain Marvel s Powers Destroy Her in Disturbing Nightmare Transformation
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCaptain Marvel’s powers are slowly destroying her in a horrifying variant cover by Peach Momoko. The cover shows Captain Marvel smiling, unaware of the destruction her powers are causing. Peach Momoko’s illustration depicts a nightmarish metamorphosis, suggesting Captain Marvel’s journey may be coming to a horrific end. Literature ReviewSuperstar artist Peach Momoko has released the most disturbing Nigthmare variant yet, starring Captain Marvel. Captain Marvel‚Äôs powers are slowly destroying her in a horrifying ‚ÄúNightmare‚Äù variant cover by artist Peach Momoko.

item.title: Captain Marvel s Son is Enduring the Grossest Zombie Transformation
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGenis-Vell, the son of original Captain Marvel, and third to bear the moniker, has been transformed into a disturbing, mindless zombie by Omen. The physical changes in Genis-Vell are as revolting as the mental changes, in what is a disgusting, tragic fate for an underrated character. Captain Marvel is unable to reach Genis-Vell, who is under Omen’s control, suggesting he may be gone for good. Literature ReviewOne former Captain Marvel has been zombified, and as a result, is going through the most “disgusting” metamorphosis as part of his transformation.

item.title: Carnage Became the Ultimate Symbiote by Using Tony Stark s Company as a Host
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCletus Kasady uses the Extrembiote to fuse himself with Tony Stark’s building, gaining control of all of New York and causing chaos. By taking over Stark Industries’ technology, Cletus can drive people insane using a symbiote frequency and amplifies his rampage through New York. Cletus Kasady proves that he is a major threat even without the Carnage symbiote, cementing himself as one of the most dangerous villains in the Marvel Universe.

item.title: Carnage Has One Huge Weakness Marvel Heroes Need to Exploit Broccoli
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCarnage, one of Marvel’s most dangerous villains, can be brought down with a dose of vitamin C, as revealed in Carnage: Mind Bomb. Injecting a symbiote’s host with a large dose of vitamin C disrupts their brain’s connection to the symbiote, rendering the symbiote helpless for a few minutes. While vitamin C is effective against symbiotes like Carnage, its effects are only temporary, before the symbiote can reconnect and regain control.

item.title: Carnage Is Becoming A True Marvel God (And He s Closer Than You Think)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCarnage aims to become a god and is actively pursuing this goal by changing his approach to killing. Carnage believes he is immortal and wants to gather worshippers to make his divinity official. Building a cult and church around himself, Carnage seeks to demonstrate his power and become a god in the Marvel Universe. Literature ReviewCarnage has recently decided that he wants to become a true god, and he’s a lot closer to achieving this goal than most people might think.

item.title: Carnage is Evolving and Taking a Page from Joker s Book
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYhttps://static0.srcdn.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/joker-vs-carnage.jpgCarnage changes his approach to killing, opting for more theatrical and attention-grabbing methods to gain worshipers and become a god. Carnage’s previous preference for indiscriminate slaughter without a message hasn’t driven anyone to worship him, so he shifts his tactics. Carnage recognizes the value in Joker’s views on murder and adopts a similar approach to killing, hoping to gather new followers and attain godhood. Literature ReviewCarnage and the Joker are two of the most deadly serial killers to ever exist, and now it seems Carnage is learning a lesson from the Joker.

item.title: Carnage Proved He Was Worse Than Joker With One Dark Feat
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCarnage proved himself worse than the Joker by driving a therapist violently insane, leaving no hope of recovery, ultimately leading to the man’s death. While the Joker manipulated Harley Quinn with lies, Carnage showed Dr. Kurtz an honest look into his worldview, driving him completely insane as a result. Unlike Harley, Dr. Kurtz didn’t stand a chance at redemption or recovery. This demonstrates that Carnage’s treatment of therapists is far worse than Joker’s, who consideres them more like toys to be played with.

item.title: Carnage Proved His Godhood By Replicating Thor s Most Epic MCU Feat
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn Carnage #10, the deadly symbiote proved his incredible strength and durability by surviving an event greater amount of cosmic heat than nearly killed Thor in the MCU. Carnage’s quest to become a god leads him to forge a powerful sword, but he is tricked into being hit by the full force of the forge’s energy…which ultimately proves ineffective against him. Despite the immense amount of energy unleashed on him, Carnage is saved by the arrival of Jon Shayde, who contains a piece of Carnage symbiote, and is able to escape and launch a counterattack.

item.title: Carnage s Grotesque New Healing Factor Proves He s Become a God
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCarnage showcases his most extreme healing factor yet, demonstrating his status as one of the toughest villains in comics. The Carnage symbiote’s regenerative abilities are taken to absurd lengths, allowing it to recreate Cletus Kasady from scratch. With each new feat, Carnage becomes stronger and more unstoppable, proving himself to be practically immortal as long as the symbiote exists. Literature ReviewCarnage has done a lot of disturbing stuff over the years, but his newest feat not only proves how gross he is, but also the fact he is a god.

item.title: Carnage s Most Terrifying Host Came from His Attempt to Save a Little Girl
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPrimarily known as a villain, Carnage’s occasional attempt at heroism leads to horrifying results, including turning an abused child into a brutal serial killer. Carnage has a tendency to develop a cult-like following and spare those who amuse him, though his precise reason for bonding with Elsie is unknown. Elsie, a twisted follower of Carnage, could possibly return to comics and aid her mentor in creating the Church of Carnage.

item.title: Carnage s Symbiote Cult Gets a Movie-Quality Redesign in God-Tier Fanart
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCarnage’s cult member receives a movie-quality redesign in stunning fan art, complete with the trademark red spiral on their face. Carnage is a remorseless killer who has gained followers and now seeks to achieve godhood in his new ongoing series. BossLogic’s artwork captures the chilling menace of Carnage’s cult, with the acolyte fully embracing their descent into madness and violence. Literature ReviewCarnage is slowly building a cult in the Marvel Universe, and artist BossLogic gives them a chilling, movie-quality makeover.

item.title: Carnage Used His Rarest Power to Expose Spider-Man s Secret Identity
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSpider-Man’s secret identity is at risk when Carnage learns who he really is, putting his loved ones in danger. Carnage’s plan involves hunting down symbiote-bonded individuals to use their codexes to unleash chaos. Carnage is able to get close to Spider-Man undetected due to the Venom symbiote’s bypassing of Peter’s Spider-Sense. Literature ReviewSpider-Man’s secret identity is immensely important to him, and when a killer like Carnage learns it, it’s guaranteed to end in disaster.

item.title: Carnage vs. Carnage Marvel s Most Disturbing Team-up of All Time Has Arrived
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCarnage has struggled to find reliable teammates, but now he has teamed up with another version of his most infamous host: Cletus Kasady. The original Cletus Kasady survived his battle with Tony Stark and has now teamed up with a younger version of himself, created by Carnage. Marvel’s heroes will need to deal with the consequences of two versions of the deranged serial killers teaming up up with the Carnage symbiote.

item.title: Carol Danvers Officially Proves Why She s the Best Captain Marvel
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCarol Danvers is established as the strongest and best Captain Marvel, defeating Genis-Vell even with her limited power. Genis-Vell, the third Captain Marvel, is resurrected as a zombie under the control of Omen and forced to fight Carol. Carol proves her strength by easily fending off Genis-Vell with just kicks and punches, showing that she would be victorious if she could access her full power. Literature ReviewCarol Danvers proves that she’s the best to wear the Captain Marvel mantle by defeating one of the heroes who previously held that role.

item.title: Cassandra Cain Batgirl Cosplay Honors the Bat-Family s Official Best Fighter
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAn incredibly skilled cosplayer perfectly embodies Cassandra Cain’s Batgirl. The cosplayer is joined by Barbara Gordon, the original Batgirl, adding to the thrilling bat-centric celebration and creating a dynamic duo. The cosplayer’s solo photos highlight her meticulous craftsmanship and immense skill, showcasing her ability to design, paint, and assemble a cosplay with a professional and authentic outcome. Literature ReviewA cosplayer has truly honored the Bat-Family‚Äôs best fighter, Cassandra Cain, with an exceptionally badass and beautifully crafted Batgirl costume.

item.title: Catwoman Cosplay Predicted the Return of a Totally Unexpected Costume
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCatwoman’s 90s purple design makes a comeback in a new cosplay, combining two of her best looks. It’s a unique twist on an iconic outfit. The cosplayer, @cutiepiesensei, has an impressive portfolio and a large following, with a knack for creating captivating designs. This cosplay design predicts Catwoman’s return to her popular 90s outfit in the comics, showcasing a sleek purple catsuit with a more tactical feel, complete with a utility belt and confident criminal attitude.

item.title: Charlie Brown Art Fixes How Every Movie Misunderstands His Design
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCharlie Brown’s iconic (and puzzling) hairstyle finally makes sense, thanks to a charming piece of fan art showing a more accurate depiction. The original Peanuts strips and Peanuts Movie misinterpret Charlie’s hair as one long strand, leading to assumptions about him being bald. Jokeb0i’s fan art clarifies Charlie’s hair, giving him a more average haircut (while still maintaining his familiar and beloved appearance). Literature ReviewCharlie Brown‚Äôs luck is turning around, as one amazing piece of fan art finally gives him a haircut that explains how the character should look.

item.title: Christopher Reeve s Superman 78 Canon Just Introduced Green Lantern
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSuperman ‘78 introduces Green Lantern, expanding the Richard Donner Superman franchise and potentially setting the stage for a future Justice League. The pilot in the story strongly resembles Hal Jordan, leading to speculation that he could become the Green Lantern in this continuity. The addition of Green Lantern to Superman ‘78 suggests that more heroes may debut in the series, potentially forming their own Justice League. Literature ReviewThe ground is set for Green Lantern to join Superman‚Äôs film canon after Christopher Reeves‚Äô Clark rescues a pilot that remarkably favors Hal Jordan.

item.title: Clark Kent Owes His Career To His Biggest Source Lex Luthor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSuperman’s career as a reporter was jumpstarted by information he received from his nemesis Lex Luthor, showcasing the ironic dynamic between the two characters. Clark Kent’s reporting plays a vital role in bringing down corrupt individuals, highlighting the importance of his journalistic identity alongside his superhero persona. Lex Luthor manipulates Clark’s reporting to further his own agenda, using it as a weapon to eliminate his competitors and gain control over Metropolis.

item.title: Classic Magical Girl Manga Returns With Special New Arc
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card released its last chapter in Nakayoshi magazine on December 1. The manga will receive a “Special Arc” in the magazine’s April 2024 issue, which comes out on March 1. Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card has been serialized since 2016 and and is a follow-up series to CLAMP’s other work, Cardcaptor Sakura. IT received an anime adaptation in 2018. Literature ReviewKodansha’s Nakayoshi magazine announced that it will publish a “Special Arc” for Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card in its April 2024 issue.

item.title: Cobra Commander Finally Kills a Beloved G.I. Joe Hero
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYG.I. Joe: A Real American Hero #301 marks the start of a new era with a major character death at the hands of Cobra Commander. The decision to kill off Wade Collins fits with the poignancy of his story arc, according to writer Larry Hama. Hama admits to not planning out plots in advance and lets the characters write themselves, prioritizing consistent character development over specific plotlines. Literature ReviewIn Skybound’s G.

item.title: Cobra Commander Just Brought a Classic G.I. Joe Villain into New Continuity
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCobra Commander will encounter various factions and villains in his search for Energon, including the Dreadnoks, who will pose a particular challenge. Zarana, the younger sister of Zartan and a master of disguise, will face off against Cobra Commander, adding an interesting dynamic to the story. It is likely that Cobra Commander will also come into conflict with other organizations, such as the M.A.R.S weapons manufacturing company and its leader, Destro, as he continues his quest for Energon.

item.title: Colossus Deserves Way More Credit for Being Worthy of Mjolnir
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYColossus’ ability to wield Mjolnir shows that he is pure of heart and ultimately good, despite recent actions calling into question his integrity. Colossus’ heroic nature is evident in his willingness to sacrifice himself for others, as seen in the Legacy Virus storyline. Although Colossus has recently fallen from grace, his kind-hearted warrior nature makes him one of Marvel’s most worthy heroes. Literature ReviewColossus just spent four years being puppeted and manipulated by his brother, but beneath that experience is a heart of a hero worthy of Mjolnir.

item.title: Colossus Is Redeemed & Cyclops Faces Death in First Look at X-Men s Last Stand
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Krakoan Era of X-Men, which began with House of X and Powers of X, is coming to an end after five years. Fall of the House of X and Rise of the Powers of X are interconnected series that will close out the Krakoan Era with a bang. The preview for Fall #1 reveals that Cyclops will face a trial by Orchis, while Colossus will make a heroic return after killing his brother.

item.title: Cowboy Ghost Rider Cosplay Resurrects Marvel s Most Tragic Spirit of Vengeance
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThis remarkable Ghost Rider cosplay brings the iconic Trail of Tears iteration of the character to life, showcasing the potential for a cowboy Ghost Rider on the big screen in the process. The visual editing artistry and attention to detail in this cosplay elevate it to a true masterpiece, resembling a movie still. This cosplay pays tribute to the Ghost Rider: Trail of Tears comic series, highlighting a lesser-known Ghost Rider and encouraging fans to explore the many iconic Spirit of Vengeance storylines from throughout the history of the Marvel Universe.

item.title: Creepy Harley Quinn Cover Art Turns the Goofy Hero Into a Nightmarish Demon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHarley Quinn’s classic jester look makes a dark and unsettling comeback in the variant cover for Harley Quinn #37. This new variant cover showcases Harley wielding her iconic oversized mallet and wearing a creepy patchwork jester hat. The cover captures a more intimidating and terrifying side of Harley Quinn, proving that she can be just as unsettling as the Joker. Literature ReviewHarley Quinn has had some brave looks before, but a new variant cover gives her a frightening appearance that‚Äôs unsettling, but damn hardcore.

item.title: Cyberpunk Edgerunners Creator Gets Manga Serialized On Shonen Jump
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNo\Name, a manga by the writer of Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, won the first-ever Gold Award for MANGA Plus Creators, earning a monetary prize and the opportunity to be published by Shueisha. The manga is set in a world where the government chooses people’s names at birth, and follows the investigation of a mother and son’s mysterious disappearance. It has a suspenseful plot and a unique power system. The popularity of No\Name with over 2 million readers, led to its victory in the competition.

item.title: Cyclops Son Is Defined by 1 Heartbreaking Phrase (According to Marvel)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCable’s tragic origin story, beginning with his early years as Nathan Summers, the son of X-Men leader Cyclops, have made him one of Marvel’s most complex figures. The decision to merge the characters of Nathan Summers and Cable created a unique dynamic with his father, Scott Summers; years later, the Kid Cable variant of the character offers the opportunity for the older Cable to guide and shape his younger self.

item.title: Cyclops Son Just Recruited Another Summers Family Member As His Official Sidekick
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCable recruits his younger self, Nate, as his sidekick, marking a major shift in their tumultuous relationship. Nate had previously killed Cable, believing he was damaging the timeline, but now they’ve reconciled and are working together. Cable saves Nate’s life as a way of returning the favor for Nate’s earlier efforts to resurrect him, allowing them to start anew on an adventure. Literature ReviewCyclops’ son, Cable, just got a new sidekick, and based on their Marvel Comics history, his choice is a shocking fellow member of the Summers family.

item.title: Cyclops is About To Be Replaced By [SPOILER] as X-Men s Ultimate Hero - Theory Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCypher’s power of omnilingualism may be crucial in Krakoa’s battle against the Enigma Dominion. Cypher’s ability to communicate with anything that uses language has only grown stronger over time. Cypher is confirmed to be part of Xavier’s newest squad and may play a key role in deciphering and understanding the Dominion’s plans. Literature ReviewThe hero Cypher, missing since Krakoa kidnapped him in Immortal X-Men #13, could prove crucial to the X-Men’s defeat of the coming Enigma Dominion.

item.title: Danny Rand Doesn t Need the Iron Fist to be a Hero
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDanny Rand’s latest appearance in Luke Cage: Gang War proves he doesn’t need the Iron Fist to be a hero, showcasing his martial arts skills as a central part of the crossover event. As CEO of Rand Corporation, Danny has been a background character, but joining Luke Cage’s team allows him to shine again. The loss of his mystical powers opens up new storytelling possibilities for Danny Rand, highlighting his badass martial arts skills and hero’s heart, independent of the Iron Fist.

item.title: Daredevil Admits The One Reason He Really Shouldn t Be On The Avengers
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaredevil’s radar sense doesn’t work well in large-scale battles, as he finds himself in with the Avengers in Daredevil #5, making him question his place in the team. Chaotic environments heavily interfere with Daredevil’s radar sense, making it difficult for him to use his powers effectively. Daredevil operates best as a hero when working alone, as his powers are sensitive and work best under specific circumstances. Literature ReviewDaredevil is a major hero in the Marvel Universe, and like most major heroes, he eventually joined the Avengers, even if he admits he shouldn’t have.

item.title: Daredevil Cosplay Proves Simpler Is Better for the Man Without Fear
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA Daredevil cosplayer shows that simplicity is better when it comes to translating the classic costume into live-action. The iconic red costume with distinctive shading captures the essence of Daredevil’s design. Filmmakers should take inspiration from the cosplay and bring the classic red Daredevil to life on-screen. Literature ReviewA new cosplay brings Daredevil’s all-red costume from the comics to life brilliantly, beating out all previous live-action adaptations. There‚Äôs no question that Daredevil has one of the greatest superhero costumes of all time.

item.title: Daredevil Lives By One Famous Batman Quote
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaredevil’s scheme to save his secret identity involves his fake twin brother confessing to being Daredevil on camera. Daredevil lives by Batman’s iconic line that criminals are a “superstitious, cowardly lot.” Criminals in New York fear Daredevil, showing that his use of fear as a symbol works just like Batman’s approach. Literature ReviewDaredevil is one of the greatest street-level heroes that Marvel has to offer, and part of that might just be because he follows one Batman rule.

item.title: Daredevil Proved His Radar Sense is Stronger Than Spider-Man s Spider-Sense
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaredevil’s radar sense is stronger than Spider-Man’s spider-sense, providing him with a more specific and detailed understanding of threats. Daredevil’s radar sense allows him to quickly determine the exact threat, giving him an edge over Spider-Man in certain situations. While Spider-Man has more “super” powers, Daredevil’s radar sense ensures he is always aware of his surroundings and can avoid danger. Literature ReviewSpider-Man and Daredevil may be two of the greatest street-level Marvel heroes, but Daredevil has one slight advantage over Spider-Man.

item.title: Daredevil s Dog Pack Fight Can Give the MCU Its Most Brutal Fight Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaredevil faces a unique and dangerous fight against a group of rabid dogs who have been given the same powers as him. The fight showcases Daredevil’s ability to overcome his weaknesses and use his training to defeat the dogs without causing them harm. The twisted joke behind the fight is revealed, with Daredevil’s nemesis, Bullseye, using the dogs as a sick mockery of seeing-eye dogs to taunt him. Literature ReviewDaredevil has been in plenty of intense fights, but one particular brawl from an older comic took things to an absolutely absurd level.

item.title: Daredevil s Extreme 90s Armor Has a Secret Power That Protects His Identity
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaredevil’s black armor completely transforms his appearance, making him unrecognizable even to his closest nemesis, Kingpin. Matt Murdock’s acting skills and ninja training help him mislead others and further protect his secret identity. The black armor not only provides protection but also gives Daredevil a fresh start and a chance to reclaim his past. Literature ReviewDaredevil’s classic 90s black armor is back, and has just been revealed to have a secret power that any superhero would kill to possess.

item.title: Daredevil s New Identity Officially Makes Him Marvel s Best Exorcist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaredevil becomes the best exorcist in the Marvel Universe after successfully exorcising demons from both Elektra and Ben Urich. Daredevil’s newfound ability to see demons and cast them out follows his death and resurrection as a Catholic priest. Despite the promise of more demons to come, Daredevil is prepared and ready to face any challenges as Marvel’s go-to exorcist. Literature ReviewFollowing his death and resurrection, Daredevil’s latest series has officially becoming the best exorcist that the Marvel Universe has to offer.

item.title: Daredevil s Version of Kryptonite Is So Common, It s Surprising He Can Ever Fight
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDaredevil’s biggest weakness, rain, severely reduces his powers by 95 percent, nullifying his sense of smell and hearing. In a fight with the villain Ikari, Daredevil attempts to trap him by luring him into a sporting goods store and activating the sprinkler system. Unfortunately, Ikari is not affected by the rain and is able to defeat Daredevil mercilessly, showcasing his abilities. Literature ReviewDaredevil is one of Marvel’s most powerful street-level heroes, but he has a weakness that is so common it’s surprising he can function at all.

item.title: Daredevil vs She-Hulk Is Rewriting Their MCU Romance as a Rivalry
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn the MCU, She-Hulk and Daredevil have a budding romance, but in the comics, their relationship is rewritten as a rivalry. Matt Murdock, now a priest, encounters She-Hulk at a store, which is awkward for him due to his different memories of his reborn life. Although Daredevil and She-Hulk may become rivals in the comics, their past indicates that their relationship, romantic or otherwise, is strong, meaning they will likely recover from this upcoming rivalry.

item.title: Dark Horse Examines Comics Most Notorious Figure in DR. WERTHLESS (Exclusive)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDr. Werthless: The Man Who Studied Murder delves into the controversial figure Dr. Fredric Wertham, exploring both his negative impact on the comic book industry and his desire to understand the causes of violence. The graphic novel provides a balanced portrayal of Wertham, highlighting his regressive views on comics while also acknowledging his progressive work in other areas and his attempts to improve the lives of disadvantaged individuals. Schechter and Powell’s collaboration aims to offer readers a better understanding of Wertham and the significant influence he had on the comic book world, showcasing his complex and multifaceted nature.

item.title: Darkest Hour, Day of Blood, Energon 2023 Proved Marvel & DC s Ambitious Storytelling Is Great For the Comic Book Industry
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMarvel and DC have made major changes to their superhero titles in the past year, relaunching and rebooting many of their books, while overall focusing on telling stories of an increasingly grand scope. In 2023, Skybound Entertainment’s acquisition of Transformers and G.I. Joe led to a successful reboot of both franchises in the new Energon Universe. Boom! Studios’ Power Rangers comics have redefined the series by telling more mature stories, including the year-long event called “Darkest Hour,” which promises to have a franchise-altering impact.

item.title: Darkhawk & Night Thrasher Cosplay Resurrects the Ultimate 90s Heroes
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKnightmage100 brings 90s heroes Darkhawk and Night Thrasher to life in stunning cosplays. Darkhawk and Night Thrasher embody the spirit of Marvel in the 1990s, still relevant today. Knightmage100’s cosplays introduce these characters to a new generation of fans, keeping them alive. Literature ReviewIt may be tempting to write Darkhawk and Night Thrasher off as dated relics, but a new cosplay shows these character’s potential. New cosplays of Darhawk and Night Thrasher have resurrected the ultimate 90s heroes.

item.title: Darkseid vs Mister Mxyzptlk Fanart Settles Which of DC s Cosmic Gods Would Win
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKerry Callen’s artwork hilariously portrays Mister Mxyzptlk defeating Darkseid by turning him into a giant baby. Callen’s interpretation is supported by canonical comic storylines, such as the Emperor Joker storyline, where Darkseid surrenders to Mxyzptlk’s powers. However, a notable exception in the canon shows Darkseid defeating Mister Mxyzptlk in DCeased: War of the Undead Gods, highlighting the weakness in Mxyzptlk’s character. Literature ReviewA hilarious fanart emerges to finally settle the age-old debate of who would emerge victorious in a battle between DC’s Darkseid and Mister Mxyzptlk.

item.title: Darkwing Ducks Justice Ducks Assemble in Preview of New Disney Series
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDarkwing Duck’s hero team, the Justice Ducks, will be getting their own spin-off comic series in 2024. The Justice Ducks have had rare appearances, making this series highly anticipated for Disney fans. The team will be facing a new threat from a team of aliens. Literature ReviewThe Disney Afternoon superhero team, the Justice Ducks will finally get a chance to shine in comics, with their own series from Dynamite Comics.

item.title: Darth Vader Finally Has His Own Chewbacca, As the M.A.R. Corps Join the Empire
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDarth Vader introduces his own team of cyborg warriors, the Machine Augmented Rebel Corps (M.A.R Corps), to aid him in his dark agenda. The M.A.R. Corps are unique in that they possess different skills and capabilities, making them less predictable than the Empire’s identical forces. Vader now has complete control over the M.A.R. Corps, combining their total obedience with their formidable combat skills, making them potentially his ultimate weapon.

item.title: Darth Vader Is Replacing His Death Troopers With [SPOILER]
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Darth Vader comic series reveals the Dark Lord’s intention to replace his Death Troopers with superior agents he can fully control. Vader plans to corrupt Rebellion cyborg warriors and reprogram their mechanical components to ensure their compliance. The new soldiers will be more deadly and dangerous than Death Troopers, and they will be under Vader’s complete command, incapable of betrayal. Literature ReviewDarth Vader is making a change following a massive Death Trooper betrayal in the Star Wars canon, replacing them with brand new agents.

item.title: Darth Vader Is Upgrading His Death Troopers... By Removing Their Free Will
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDarth Vader plans to remove the free will of his Death Troopers to ensure they never betray him again. Vader’s Death Troopers were carefully chosen and created by him, but their loyalty was ultimately to Palpatine. If successful, Vader will have more intimidating and loyal Death Troopers that are solely his tools alone. Literature ReviewDarth Vader is planning to correct a major mistake with his fearsome Death Troopers in the Star Wars canon, and the solution is extremely dark.

item.title: Darth Vader s Forgotten Force Power Is Even More Powerful Than the Original Trilogy Showed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDarth Vader’s Force-choking abilities were showcased in Star Wars: Episode V, but they received a major upgrade in the recent Star Wars: Darth Vader #41 comic. In the comic, Vader uses a viral AI hivemind called the Scourge to control nearby infected droids. He attacks Storm Troopers using their eyes as his visual connection, eliminating a whole strike team effortlessly with remote Force attacks. This highlights the extent of Vader’s ability to use the Force from a distance, revealing that in his hands, a camera can be the deadliest weapon in all of Star Wars.

item.title: Darth Vader s New Sith Science Proves He d Have Been a More Terrifying Emperor Than Palpatine
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDarth Vader’s Sith science experiments on living organisms reveal how he would handle ruling the galaxy, making him a more terrifying Emperor than Palpatine. Vader’s mastery over the Scourge virus allows him to assimilate droids and cyborgs, granting him control over their actions and thoughts, which inspires him to create his own version of assimilation. By blending technology and the dark side of the Force, Vader seeks to infect the minds of the living to eliminate individualism and assert his dominance over everyone, making him a Sith heretic and a worse option for Emperor than Palpatine.

item.title: Darth Vader Turned His Armor from Junk to Superweapon After Empire Strikes Back
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDarth Vader’s suit was destroyed by Emperor Palpatine after Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back. Vader had to rebuild his suit with outdated droid parts that amounted to little more than junk. Darth Vader has made so many upgrades to his suit since then that he can now remotely control droids and cyborgs through it - and all of this happened between the events of Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi.

item.title: DC & Marvel s Two Best New Characters of the Year Were BORN to Cross Over
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDC and Marvel fans are already hyped over the idea of a crossover between recently introduced characters City Boy and the Impossible City, as both characters have unique powers that complement each other. City Boy has already interacted with famous DC characters and cities, showcasing his dynamic powers in his own ongoing series. The Impossible City, a sentient city and the Avengers’ new base, joined Earth’s Mightiest Heroes in the latest Avengers issue, and offers rich storytelling potential as a unique type of Marvel hero.

item.title: DC Artist Admits Where Fans Can Find Hidden Doctor Who Reference
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAcclaimed artist Bruno Redondo reveals a hidden Doctor Who Easter egg in the Injustice comic series, delighting fans with its subtle brilliance. Redondo artfully depicts the Tower of Fate in Injustice to mirror a scene from Doctor Who, showcasing his love for both fandoms. With his attention to detail and commitment to storytelling, Redondo’s clever homage is sure to be appreciated by fans of both DC and Doctor Who.

item.title: DC Calls Out the Justice League s Biggest Failure, Going Back to 1985
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBizarro returns and is furious over the continuous crises in the multiverse. Bizarro invades the Sorcerer’s World and gains a powerful magical upgrade. Bizarro reveals that Bizarro World has gone missing due to the ongoing crises, and other DC realities are at risk of disappearing too. Literature ReviewSuperman discovers he Justice League‚Äôs inability to stop multiverse-wide calamities is having serious consequences when one world suddenly disappears. Warning! Spoilers ahead for Action Comics #1061!

item.title: DC Confirms an Iconic Titan Is Powerful Enough to Destroy Earth (& It s Not Raven)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTitans’ member Cyborg’s “boom tubes” have the potential to cause catastrophic global damage, making him a much bigger threat than imagined. In Titans: Beast World #1, Cyborg reveals the extent of his boom tubes’ power-level, capable of destroying planets in moments. Despite his immense power, Cyborg’s altruistic choices keep him on the side of heroes, making him one of DC’s most powerful Titans. Literature ReviewThe Titans have an incredible line-up of capable, powerful members, yet one among their ranks has the ability to throw whole planets out of alignment.
